author: sourceforge-gudujarlson
msg: Applied some fixes to the IntraVM naming service.
- org.openejb.OpenEJB.getJNDIContext() now returns a context by the name "", instead of "openejb".
- relative names are now handled properly
- the context "java:openejb/ejb" is created irregardless of whether any EJBs are deployed
